metadata.title: The Godmother of AI Didn’t Expect It to Be This Massive
metadata.description: Stanford scientist Fei-Fei Li talks about teaching machines to see as humans do, the US-China AI arms race, and what worries her about a more automated future.
metadata.keywords: Bloomberg, Bloomberg Weekend, Weekend Interview, Fei Fei Li, ceo interviews, AI, artificial intelligence, LLMs, neural networking, DeepMind, OpenAI, DeepSeek, labour, education, policy, tech, startups, US, China, language models, big data
